dialogue.s: The more you tighten your grip, Tarkin, the more star systems will slip through your fingers.

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: Not after we demonstrate the power of this station.
In a way, you have determined the choice of the planet that'll be destroyed first.
Since you are reluctant to provide us with the location of the Rebel base, I have chosen to test this station's destructive power... on your home planet of Alderaan.

meta.s: Tarkin waves menacingly toward Leia.

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: I grow tired of asking this.
So it'll be the last time.

meta.s: Leia overhears an intercom voice announcing the approach to Alderaan.
Leia lowers her head.

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: You see Lord Vader, she can be reasonable.

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: Dantooine is too remote to make an effective demonstration.
We will deal with your Rebel friends soon enough.

meta.s: A button is pressed which switches on a panel of lights.
A hooded Imperial soldier reaches overhead and pulls a lever.
Another lever is pulled.
Vader reaches for still another lever and a bank of lights on a panel and wall light up.
A huge beam of light emanates from within a cone-shaped area and converges into a single laser beam out toward Alderaan.
The small green planet of Alderaan is blown into space dust.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - CENTRAL HOLD AREA

meta.s: Ben watches Luke practice the lightsaber with a small "seeker" robot.
Ben suddenly turns away and sits down.
He falters, seems almost faint.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: I felt a great disturbance in the Force... as if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced.
I fear something terrible has happened.

meta.s: Ben rubs his forehead.
He seems to drift into a trance.
Then he fixes his gaze on Luke.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: You'd better get on with your exercises.

meta.s: Han Solo enters the room.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Well, you can forget your troubles with those Imperial slugs.

meta.s: Luke is once again practicing with the lightsaber.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Don't everyone thank me at once.

meta.s: Threepio watches Chewbacca and Artoo who are engrossed in a game in which three-dimensional holographic figures move along a chess-type board.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Anyway, we should be at Alderaan about oh-two-hundred hours.

meta.s: Chewbacca and the two robots sit around the lighted table covered with small holographic monsters.
Each side of the table has a small computer monitor embedded in it.
Chewbacca seems very pleased with himself as he rests his lanky fur- covered arms over his head.
Artoo immediately reaches up and taps the computer with his stubby claw hand, causing one of the holographic creatures to walk to the new square.
A sudden frown crosses Chewbacca's face and he begins yelling gibberish at the tiny robot.
Threepio intercedes on behalf of his small companion and begins to argue with the huge Wookiee.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: Screaming about it won't help you.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: It's not wise to upset a Wookiee.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: But sir, nobody worries about upsetting a droid.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: That's 'cause droids don't pull people's arms out of their socket when they lose.
Wookiees are known to do that.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: I suggest a new strategy, Artoo.

meta.s: Luke stands in the middle of the small hold area; he seems frozen in place.
A humming lightsaber is held high over his head.
Ben watches him from the corner, studying his movements.
Han watches with a bit of smugness.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: Remember, a Jedi can feel the Force flowing through him.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: You mean it controls your actions?

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: But it also obeys your commands.

meta.s: Suspended at eye level, about ten feet in front of Luke, a "seeker", a chrome baseball-like robot covered with antennae, hovers slowly in a wide arc.
The ball floats to one side of the youth then the other.
Suddenly it makes a lightning-swift lunge and stops within a few feet of Luke's face.
Luke doesn't move and the ball backs off.
It slowly moves behind the boy, then makes another quick lunge, this time emitting a blood red laser beam as it attacks.
It hits Luke in the leg causing him to tumble over.
Han lets loose with a burst of laughter.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: You don't believe in the Force, do you?

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Kid, I've flown from one side of this galaxy to the other.
I've seen a lot of strange stuff, but I've never seen anything to make me believe there's one all-powerful force controlling everything.
There's no mystical energy field that controls my destiny.

meta.s: Ben smiles quietly.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: It's all a lot of simple tricks and nonsense.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: I suggest you try it again, Luke.

meta.s: Ben places a large helmet on Luke's head which covers his eyes.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: This time, let go your conscious self and act on instinct.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: (laughing) With the blast shield down, I can't even see.
How am I supposed to fight?

meta.s: Han skeptically shakes his head as Ben throws the seeker into the air.
The ball shoots straight up in the air, then drops like a rock.
Luke swings the lightsaber around blindly missing the seeker, which fires off a laserbolt which hits Luke square on the seat of the pants.
He lets out a painful yell and attempts to hit the seeker.
Luke stands in one place, seemingly frozen.
The seeker makes a dive at Luke and, incredibly, he managed to deflect the bolt.
The ball ceases fire and moves back to its original position.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: You see, you can do it.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: In my experience, there's no such thing as luck.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Look, going good against remotes is one thing.

meta.s: Solo notices a small light flashing on the far side of the control panel.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Looks like we're coming up on Alderaan.

meta.s: Han and Chewbacca head back to the cockpit.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: You know, I did feel something.
I could almost see the remote.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: You have taken your first step into a larger world.

meta.s: Imperial Officer Cass stands before Governor Tarkin and the evil Dark Lord Darth Vader.

dialogue.name: OFFICER CASS
dialogue.s: Our scout ships have reached Dantooine.
They found the remains of a Rebel base, but they estimate that it has been deserted for some time.
They are now conducting an extensive search of the surrounding systems.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: I told you she would never consciously betray the Rebellion.

meta.s: The pirateship is just coming out of hyperspace; a strange surreal light show surrounds the ship.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Stand by, Chewie, here we go.

meta.s: Han pulls back on a control lever.
Outside the cockpit window stars begin streaking past, seem to decrease in speed, then stop.
Suddenly the starship begins to shudder and violently shake about.
Asteroids begin to race toward them, battering the sides of the ship.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Aw, we've come out of hyperspace into a meteor shower.
It's not on any of the charts.

meta.s: The Wookiee flips off several controls and seems very cool in the emergency.
Luke makes his way into the bouncing cockpit.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Our position is correct, except... no, Alderaan!

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Thats what I'm trying to tell you, kid.

meta.s: Ben moves into the cockpit behind Luke as the ship begins to settle down.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: The entire starfleet couldn't destroy the whole planet.
It'd take a thousand ships with more fire power than I've...

meta.s: A signal starts flashing on the control panel and a muffled alarm starts humming.
Chewbacca barks his concern.
A huge explosion bursts outside the cockpit window, shaking the ship violently.
A tiny, finned Imperial TIE fighter races past the cockpit window.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: There aren't any bases around here.

meta.s: The fighter races past the Corellian pirateship.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: It sure is leaving in a big hurry.
If they identify us, we're in big trouble.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Not if I can help it.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: It'd be as well to let it go.
It's too far out of range.

meta.s: The pirateship zooms over the camera and away into the vastness of space after the Imperial TIE fighter.
The tension mounts as the pirateship gains on the tiny fighter.
In the distance, one of the stars becomes brighter until it is obvious that the TIE ship is heading for it.
Ben stands behind Chewbacca.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: A fighter that size couldn't get this deep into space on its own.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: It must have gotten lost, been part of a convoy or something.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Well, he ain't going to be around long enough to tell anyone about us.

meta.s: The TIE fighter is losing ground to the larger pirateship as they race toward camera and disappear over head.
The distant star can be distinguished as a small moon or planet.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: He's headed for that small moon.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I think I can get him before he gets there... he's almost in range.

meta.s: The small moon begins to take on the appearance of a monstrous spherical battle station.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: It's too big to be a space station.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I have a very bad feeling about this.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Chewie, lock in the auxiliary power.

meta.s: The pirateship shudders and the TIE fighter accelerates away toward the gargantuan battle station.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Why are we still moving towards it?

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: We're caught in a tractor beam!

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: But there's gotta be something you can do!

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: There's nothin' I can do about it, kid.
I'm going to have to shut down.
But they're not going to get me without a fight!

meta.s: Ben Kenobi puts a hand on his shoulder.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: But there are alternatives to fighting.

meta.s: As the battered pirate starship is towed closer to the awesome metal moon, the immense size of the massive battle station becomes staggering.
Running along the equator of the gigantic sphere is a mile-high band of huge docking ports into which the helpless pirateship is dragged.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. DEATH STAR - HUGE PORT DOORS

meta.s: The helpless Millennium Falcon is pulled past a docking port control room and huge laser turret cannons.

dialogue.name: VOICE OVER DEATH STAR INTERCOM
dialogue.s: We are opening the magnetic field.

meta.s: The pirateship is pulled in through port doors of the Death Star, coming to rest in a huge hangar.
Thirty stormtroopers stand at attention in a central assembly area.
Stormtroopers run to their posts.
A line of stormtroopers march toward the pirateship in readiness to board it, while other troopers stand with weapons ready to fire.
Tarkin pushes a button and responds to the intercom buzz.

dialogue.name: VOICE
dialogue.s: (over intercom) We've captured a freighter entering the remains of the Alderaan system.
It's markings match those of a ship that blasted its way out of Mos Eisley.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: They must be trying to return the stolen plans to the princess.
She may yet be of some use to us.

meta.s: Vader and a commander approach the troops as an Officer and several heavily armed troops exit the spacecraft.

dialogue.name: OFFICER
dialogue.s: (to Vader) There's no one on board, sir.
According to the log, the crew abandoned ship right after takeoff.
It must be a decoy, sir.
Several of the escape pods have been jettisoned.

dialogue.name: OFFICER
dialogue.s: If there were any on board, they must also have jettisoned.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: Send a scanning crew on board.
I want every part of this ship checked.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: I sense something... a presence I haven't felt since...

meta.s: Vader turns quickly and exits the hangar.

dialogue.name: OFFICER
dialogue.s: Get me a scanning crew in here on the double.
I want every part of this ship checked!

meta.s: A trooper runs through the hallway heading for the exit.
In a few moments all is quiet.
The muffled sounds of a distant officer giving orders finally fade.
Two floor panels suddenly pop up revealing Han Solo and Luke.
Ben Kenobi sticks his head out of a third locker.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Boy, it's lucky you had these compartments.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I never thought I'd be smuggling myself in them.
Even if I could take off, I'd never get past the tractor beam.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I knew that you were going to say that!

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: Who's the more foolish... the fool or the fool who follows him?

meta.s: Han shakes his head, muttering to himself.
Chewbacca agrees.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY

meta.s: The crewmen carry a heavy box on board the ship, past the two stormtroopers guarding either side of the ramp.

dialogue.name: TROOPER
dialogue.s: If the scanners pick up anything, report it immediately.

meta.s: The crewmen enter the pirateship and a loud crashing sound is followed by a voice calling to the guard below.

dialogue.name: HAN'S VOICE
dialogue.s: Hey down there, could you give us a hand with this?

meta.s: The stormtroopers enter the ship and a quick round of gunfire is heard.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - FORWARD BAY - COMMAND OFFICE

meta.s: In a very small command office near the entrance to the pirateship, a Gantry Officer looks out his window and notices the guards are missing.
He speaks into the comlink.

dialogue.name: GANTRY OFFICER
dialogue.s: Why aren't you at your post?

meta.s: A stormtrooper comes down the ramp of the pirateship and waves to the gantry officer, pointing to his ear indicating his comlink is not working.
The gantry officer shakes his head in disgust and heads for the door, giving his aide an annoyed look.

dialogue.name: GANTRY OFFICER
dialogue.s: I'll see what I can do.

meta.s: As the officer approaches the door, it slides open revealing the towering Chewbacca.
The gantry officer, in a momentary state of shock, stumbles backward.
With a bone- chilling howl, the giant Wookiee flattens the officer with one blow.
The aide immediately reaches for his pistol, but is blasted by Han, dressed as an Imperial stormtrooper.
Ben and the robots enter the room quickly followed by Luke, also dressed as a stormtrooper.
Luke quickly removes his helmet.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: You know, between his howling and your blasting everything in sight, it's a wonder the whole station doesn't know we're here.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I prefer a straight fight to all this sneaking around.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: We found the computer outlet, sir.

meta.s: Ben feeds some information into the computer and a map of the city appears on the monitor.
He begins to inspect it carefully.
Threepio and Artoo look over the control panel.
Artoo finds something that makes him whistle wildly.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: He should be able to interpret the entire Imperial computer network.

meta.s: Artoo punches his claw arm into the computer socket and the vast Imperial brain network comes to life, feeding information to the little robot.
After a few moments, he beeps something.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: He says he's found the main computer to power the tractor beam that's holding the ship here.
He'll try to make the precise location appear on the monitor.

meta.s: The computer monitor flashes readouts.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: The tractor beam is coupled to the main reactor in seven locations.
A power loss at one of the terminals will allow the ship to leave.

meta.s: Ben studies the data on the monitor readout.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: I don't think you boys can help.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I've done more that I bargained for on this trip already.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I want to go with you.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: Stay and watch over the droids.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: They must be delivered safely or other star systems will suffer the same fate as Alderaan.
Your destiny lies along a different path than mine.
The Force will be with you... always!

meta.s: Ben adjusts the lightsaber on his belt and silently steps out of the command office, then disappears down a long grey hallway.
Chewbacca barks a comment and Han shakes his head in agreement.
Han looks at Luke.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Where did you dig up that old fossil?

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Yeah, great at getting us into trouble.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I didn't hear you give any ideas...

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Well, anything would be better than just hanging around waiting for him to pick us up...

meta.s: Suddenly Artoo begins to whistle and beep a blue streak.
Luke goes over to him.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: I'm afraid I'm not quite sure, sir.
He says "I found her", and keeps repeating, "She's here."

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Well, who... who has he found?

meta.s: Artoo whistles a frantic reply.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: I'm afraid she's scheduled to be terminated.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: She's the one in the message... We've got to help her.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Now, look, don't get any funny ideas.
The old man wants us to wait right here.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: But he didn't know she was here.
Look, will you just find a way back into the detention block?

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Look, a few minutes ago you said you didn't want to just wait here to be captured.
Now all you want to do is stay.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Marching into the detention area is not what I had in mind.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: But they're going to kill her!

meta.s: Chewbacca growls.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Listen, if you were to rescue her, the reward would be...

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Well more wealth that you can imagine.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I don't know, I can imagine quite a bit!

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: But you'd better be right about this.

meta.s: Han looks at Chewie, who grunts a short grunt.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Uh... Threepio, hand me those binders there will you?

meta.s: Luke moves toward Chewbacca with electronic cuffs.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Now, I'm going to put these on you.

meta.s: Chewie lets out a hideous growl.
Luke sheepishly hands the binders to Han.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I think I know what he has in mind.

meta.s: The Wookiee has a worried and frightened look on his face as Han binds him with the electronic cuffs.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: Pardon me for asking... but, ah... what should Artoo and I do if we're discovered here?

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: And hope they don't have blasters.

meta.s: Luke and Han put on their armored stormtrooper helmets and start off into the giant Imperial Death Star.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - DETENTION AREA - ELEVATOR TUBE

meta.s: Han and Luke try to look inconspicuous in their armored suits as they wait for a vacuum elevator to arrive.
Troops, bureaucrats, and robots bustle about, ignoring the trio completely.
Only a few give the giant Wookiee a curious glance.
Finally a small elevator arrives and the trio enters.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I can't see a thing in this helmet.

meta.s: A bureaucrat races to get aboard also, but is signaled away by Han.
The door to the pod-like vehicle slides closed and the elevator car takes off through a vacuum tube.
Several Imperial officers walk through the wide main passageway.
They pass several stormtroopers and a robot similar to Threepio but with an insect face.
At the far end of the hallway, a passing flash of Ben Kenobi appears, then disappears down a small hallway.
His appearance is so fleeting that it is hard to tell if he is real or just an illusion.
No one in the hallway seems to notice him.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - INTERIOR ELEVATOR - DETENTION SECURITY

meta.s: Luke and Han step forward to exit the elevator, but the door slides open behind them.
The giant Wookiee and his two guards enter the old grey security station.
Guards and laser gates are everywhere.
Han whispers to Luke under his breath.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: This is not going to work.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Why didn't you say so before?

meta.s: Elevator doors open.
A tall, grim looking Officer approaches the trio.

dialogue.name: OFFICER
dialogue.s: Where are you taking this... thing?

meta.s: Chewie growls a bit at the remark but Han nudges him to shut up.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Prisoner transfer from Block one-one- three-eight.

meta.s: The officer goes back to his console and begins to punch in the information.
There are only three other troopers in the area.
Luke and Han survey the situation, checking all of the alarms, laser gates, and camera eyes.
Han unfastens one of Chewbacca's electronic cuffs and shrugs to Luke.
Suddenly Chewbacca throws up his hands and lets out with one of his ear-piercing howls.
He grabs Han's laser rifle.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: He's going to pull us all apart.

meta.s: The startled guards are momentarily dumbfounded.
Luke and Han have already pulled out their laser pistols and are blasting away at the terrifying Wookiee.
Their barrage of laserfire misses Chewbacca, but hits the camera eyes, laser gate controls, and the Imperial guards.
The officer is the last of the guards to fall under the laserfire just as he is about to push the alarm system.
Han rushes to the comlink system, which is screeching questions about what is going on.
He quickly checks the computer readout.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: We've got to find out which cell this princess of yours is in.

meta.s: Luke races down one of the cell corridors.
Han speaks into the buzzing comlink.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (getting nervous) Uh... had a slight weapons malfunction.
But, uh, everything's perfectly all right now.
We're all fine here, now, thank you.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: We had a reactor leak here now.
Give us a few minutes to lock it down.

meta.s: Han blasts the comlink and it explodes.
Luke stops in front of one of the cells and blasts the door away with a laser pistol.
When the smoke clears, Luke sees the dazzling young princess-senator.
She had been sleeping and is now looking at him with an uncomprehending look on her face.
Luke is stunned by her incredible beauty and stands staring at her with his mouth hanging open.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: (finally) Aren't you a little short to be a stormtrooper?

meta.s: Luke takes off his helmet, coming out of it.
Darth Vader paces the room as Governor Tarkin sits at the far end of the conference table.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: The last time I felt it was in the presence of my old master.

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: Surely he must be dead by now.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: Don't underestimate the power of the Force.

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: The Jedi are extinct, their fire has gone out of the universe.
You, my friend, are all that's left of their religion.

meta.s: There is a quiet buzz on the comlink.

dialogue.name: INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: Governor Tarkin, we have an emergency alert in detention block A A-twenty- three.

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: If you're right, he must not be allowed to escape.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - DETENTION AREA - HALLWAY

meta.s: An ominous buzzing sound is heard on the other side of the elevator door.
Chewbacca responds with a growling noise.
A series of explosions knock a hole in the elevator door through which several Imperial troops begin to emerge.
Han and Chewie fire laser pistols at them through the smoke and flame.
They turn and run down the cell hallway, meeting up with Luke and Leia rushing toward them.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: Looks like you managed to cut off our only escape route.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (sarcastically) Maybe you'd like it back in your cell, Your Highness.

meta.s: Luke takes a small comlink transmitter from his belt as they continue to exchange fire with stormtroopers making their way down the corridor.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Are there any other ways out of the cell bay?...

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN BAY GANTRY - CONTROL TOWER

meta.s: Threepio paces the control center as little Artoo beeps and whistles a blue streak.
Threepio yells into the small comlink transmitter.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: I said, all systems have been alerted to your presence, sir.
The main entrance seems to be the only way in or out; all other information on your level is restricted.

meta.s: Someone begins banging on the door.
Luke and Leia crouch together in an alcove for protection as they continue to exchange fire with troops.
Han and Chewbacca are barely able to keep the stormtroopers at bay at the far and of the hallway.
The laserfire is very intense, and smoke fills the narrow cell corridor.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: There isn't any other way out.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I can't hold them off forever!

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: When you came in here, didn't you have a plan for getting out?

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (pointing to Luke) He's the brains, sweetheart.

meta.s: Luke manages a sheepish grin and shrugs his shoulders.
The princess grabs Luke's gun and fires at a small grate in the wall next to Han, almost frying him.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: What the hell are you doing?

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: Somebody has to save our skins.
Into the garbage chute, wise guy.

meta.s: She jumps through the narrow opening as Han and Chewbacca look on in amazement.
Chewbacca sniffs the garbage chute and says something.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Get in there you big furry oaf!
I don't care what you smell!
Get in there and don't worry about it.

meta.s: Han gives him a kick and the Wookiee disappears into the tiny opening.
Luke and Han continue firing as they work their way toward the opening.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Either I'm going to kill her or I'm beginning to like her.

meta.s: Luke ducks laserfire as he jumps into the darkness.
Han fires off a couple of quick blasts creating a smokey cover, then slides into the chute himself and is gone.
Han tumbles into the large room filled with garbage and muck.
Luke is already stumbling around looking for an exit.
He finds a small hatchway and struggles to get it open.
It won't budge.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: The garbage chute was a really wonderful idea.
What an incredible smell you've discovered!

meta.s: Han draws his laser pistol and fires at the hatch.
The laserbolt ricochets wildly around the small metal room.
Everyone dives for cover in the garbage as the bolt explodes almost on top of them.
Leia climbs out of the garbage with a rather grim look on her face.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: You're going to get us all killed.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Look, I had everything under control until you led us down here.
You know, it's not going to take them long to figure out what happened to us.

meta.s: A loud, horrible, inhuman moan works its way up from the murky depths.
Chewbacca lets out a terrified howl and begins to back away.
Han and Luke stand fast with their laser pistols drawn.
The Wookiee is cowering near one of the walls.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Something just moves past my leg!

meta.s: Suddenly Luke is yanked under the garbage.
Solo tries to get to Luke.
Luke surfaces with a gasp of air and thrashing of limbs.
A membrane tentacle is wrapped around his throat.
Leia extends a long pipe toward him.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: Luke, Luke, grab a hold of this.

meta.s: Solo fires his gun downward.
Luke is pulled back into the muck by the slimy tentacle.
Suddenly the walls of the garbage receptacle shudder and move in a couple of inches.
Then everything is deathly quiet.
Han and Leia give each other a worried look as Chewbacca howls in the corner.
With a rush of bubbles and muck Luke suddenly bobs to the surface.
Luke seems to be released by the thing.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I don't know, it just let go of me and disappeared...

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I've got a very bad feeling about this.

meta.s: Before anyone can say anything the walls begin to rumble and edge toward the Rebels.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: Try to brace it with something.

meta.s: They place poles and long metal beams between the closing walls, but they are simply snapped and bent as the giant trashmasher rumbles on.
The situation doesn't look too good.
Luke pulls out his comlink.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN GANTRY - COMMAND OFFICE

meta.s: A soft buzzer and the muted voice of Luke calling out for See-Threepio can be heard on Threepio's hand comlink, which is sitting on the deserted computer console.
Artoo and Threepio are nowhere in sight.
Suddenly there is a great explosion and the door of the control tower flies across the floor.
Four armed stormtroopers enter the chamber.

dialogue.name: FIRST TROOPER
dialogue.s: (pointing to the dead officer) See to him!

meta.s: A trooper pushes a button and the supply cabinet door slides open.
See-Threepio and Artoo-Detoo are inside.
Artoo follows his bronze companion out into the office.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: They're heading for the prison level.
If you hurry, you might catch them.

meta.s: The troops hustle off down the hallway, leaving a guard to watch over the command office.
The guard aims a blaster at them.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: All this excitement has overrun the circuits of my counterpart here.
If you don't mind, I'd like to take him down to maintenance.

meta.s: The guard nods and Threepio, with little Artoo in tow, hurries out the door.
As the walls rumble closed, the room gets smaller and smaller.
Chewie is whining and trying to hold a wall back with his giant paws.
Han is leaning back against the other wall.
Garbage is snapping and popping.
Luke is trying to reach Threepio.
Han and Leia try to brace the contracting walls with a pole.
Leia begins to sink into the trash.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY - SERVICE PANEL

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: Something must have happened to them.

meta.s: Little Artoo carefully plugs his claw arm into a new wall socket and a complex array of electronic sounds spew from the tiny robot.
The walls are only feet apart.
Leia and Han are braced against the walls.
The princess is frightened.
They look at each other.
Leia reaches out and takes Han's hand and she holds it tightly.
She's terrified and suddenly groans as she feels the first crushing pressure against her body.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: We're all going to be a lot thinner!
(to Leia) Get on top of it!

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY - SERVICE PANEL

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: (to Artoo) Thank goodness, they haven't found them!

meta.s: Artoo frantically beeps something to See-Threepio.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: I forgot I turned it off!

meta.s: Meanwhile, Luke is lying on his side, trying to keep his head above the rising ooze.
Luke's comlink begins to buzz and he rips it off his belt.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY - SERVICE PANEL

meta.s: Muffled sounds of Luke's voice over the comlink can be heard, but not distinctly.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY - SERVICE PANEL

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: (over comlink) Will you shut up and listen to me?
Shut down all garbage mashers on the detention level, will you?

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Shut down all the garbage mashers on the detention level.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY - SERVICE PANEL

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: (over comlink) Shut down all the garbage mashers on the detention level.

meta.s: Threepio holds his head in agony as he hears the incredible screaming and hollering from Luke's comlink.
The screaming and hollering is the sound of joyous relief.
The walls have stopped moving.
Han, Chewie and Leia embrace in the background.
Luke moves to the pressure sensitive hatch, looking for a number.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Hey... hey, open the pressure maintenance hatch on unit number... where are we?

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY - SERVICE PANEL
INT. DEATH STAR - TRACTOR BEAM - POWER GENERATOR TRENCH

meta.s: Ben enters a humming service trench that powers the huge tractor beam.
The trench seems to be a hundred miles deep.
The clacking sound of huge switching devices can be heard.
The old Jedi edges his his way along a narrow ledge leading to a control panel that connects two large cables.
He carefully makes several adjustments in the computer terminal, and several lights on the board go from red to blue.
The group exits the garbage room into a dusty, unused hallway.
Han and Luke remove the trooper suits and strap on the blaster belts.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: If we can just avoid any more female advice, we ought to be able to get out of here.

meta.s: Luke smiles and scratches his head as he takes a blaster from Solo.
Chewie begins growling and points to the hatch to the garbage room, as he runs away and then stops howling.
The Dia Nogu bangs against the hatch and a long, slimy tentacle works its way out of the doorway searching for a victim.
Han aims his pistol.
Han fires at the doorway.
The noise of the blast echoes relentlessly throughout the empty passageway.
Luke simply shakes his head in disgust.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (to Chewie) Come here, you big coward!

meta.s: Chewie shakes his head "no."

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: I don't know who you are, or where you came from, but from now on, you do as I tell you.

meta.s: Han is stunned at the command of the petite young girl.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Look, Your Worshipfulness, let's get one thing straight!
I take orders from one person!

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: It's a wonder you're still alive.
(looking at Chewie) Will somebody get this big walking carpet out of my way?

meta.s: Han watches her start away.
He looks at Luke.
They follow her, moving swiftly down the deserted corridor.
Suddenly a door behind Ben slides open and a detachment of stormtroopers marches to the power trench.
Ben instantly slips into the shadows as an Officer moves to within a few feet of him.

dialogue.name: OFFICER
dialogue.s: Secure this area until the alert is canceled.

meta.s: All but two of the stormtroopers leave.

dialogue.name: FIRST TROOPER
dialogue.s: Do you know what's going on?

meta.s: Ben moves around the tractor beam, watching the stormtroopers as they turn their backs to him.
Ben gestures with his hand toward them, as the troops think they hear something in the other hallway.
With the help of the Force, Ben deftly slips past the troopers and into the main hallway.
Luke, Han, Chewbacca, and Leia run down an empty hallway and stop before a bay window overlooking the pirateship.
Troopers are milling about the ship.
Luke takes out his pocket comlink.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (looking at his ship) There she is.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: Uh, we're in the main hangar across from the ship.

meta.s: Han is watching the dozen or so troops moving in and out of the pirateship.
Leia moves towards Han, touches his arm and points out the window to the ship.
Han gives her a dirty look, and they start off down the hallway.
They round a corner and run right into twenty Imperial stormtroopers heading toward them.
Both groups are taken by surprise and stop in their tracks.
Before even thinking, Han draws his laser pistol and charges the troops, firing.
His blaster knocks one of the stormtroopers into the air.
Chewie follows his captain down the corridor, stepping over the fallen trooper on the floor.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (to Luke and Leia) Get back to the ship!

meta.s: Han has already rounded a corner and does not hear.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: What good will it do us if he gets himself killed?

meta.s: Luke is furious but doesn't have time to think about it for muted alarms begin to go off down on the hangar deck.
Luke and Leia start off toward the starship hangar.
Han chases the stormtroopers down a long subhallway.
He is yelling and brandishing his laser pistol.
The troops reach a dead end and are forced to turn and fight.
Han stops a few feet from them and assumes a defensive position.
The troops begin to raise their laser guns.
Soon all ten troopers are moving into an attack position in front of the lone starpirate.
Han's determined look begins to fade as the troops begin to advance.
Solo jumps backward as they fire at him.
Chewbacca runs down the subhallway in a last-ditch attempt to save his bold captain.
Suddenly he hears the firing of laser guns and yelling.
Around the corner shoots Han, pirate extraordinaire, running for his life, followed by a host of furious stormtroopers.
Chewbacca turns and starts running the other way also.
Luke fires his laser pistol wildly as he and Leia rush down a narrow subhallway, chased by several stormtroopers.
They quickly reach the end of the subhallway and race through an open hatchway.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - CENTRAL CORE SHAFT

meta.s: Luke and Leia race through the hatch onto a narrow bridge that spans a huge, deep shaft that seems to go into infinity.
The bridge has been retracted into the wall of the shaft, and Luke almost rushes into the abyss.
He loses his balance off the end of the bridge as Leia, behind him, takes hold of his arm and pulls him back.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: (gasping) I think we took a wrong turn.

meta.s: Blasts from the stormtroopers' laser guns explode nearby reminding them of the oncoming danger.
Luke fires back at the advancing troops.
Leia reaches over and hits a switch that pops the hatch door shut with a resounding boom, leaving them precariously perched on a short piece of bridge overhang.
Laserfire from the troopers continues to hit the steel door.
Luke blasts the controls with his laser pistol.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: That oughta hold it for a while.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: Quick, we've got to get across.
Find the control that extends the bridge.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Oh, I think I just blasted it.

meta.s: Luke looks at the blasted bridge control while the stormtroopers on the opposite side of the door begin making ominous drilling and pounding sounds.
Luke notices something on his stormtrooper belt, when laserfire hits the wall behind him.
Luke aims his laser pistol at a stormtrooper perched on a higher bridge overhang across the abyss from them.
They exchange fire.
Two more troops appear on another overhang, also firing.
A trooper is hit, and grabs at his chest.
Another trooper standing on the bridge overhang is hit by Luke's laserfire, and plummets down the shaft.
Troopers move back off the bridge; Luke hands the gun to Leia.
Luke pulls a thin nylon cable from his trooper utility belt.
It has a grappler hook on it.
A trooper appears on a bridge overhang and fires at Luke and Leia.
As Luke works with the rope, Leia returns the laser volley.
Another trooper appears and fires at them, as Leia returns his fire as well.
Suddenly, the hatch door begins to open, revealing the feet of more troops.
Leia hits one of the stormtroopers on the bridge above, and he falls into the abyss.
Luke tosses the rope across the gorge and it wraps itself around an outcropping of pipes.
He tugs on the rope to make sure it is secure, then grabs the princess in his arms.
Leia looks at Luke, then kisses him quickly on the lips.
Luke is very surprised.
Luke pushes off and they swing across the treacherous abyss to the corresponding hatchway on the opposite side.
Just as Luke and Leia reach the far side of the canyon, the stormtroopers break through the hatch and begin to fire at the escaping duo.
Luke returns the fire before ducking into the tiny subhallway.
Ben hides in the shadows of the narrow passageway as several stormtroopers rush past him in the main hallway.
He checks to make sure they're gone, then runs down the hallway in the opposite direction.
Darth Vader appears at the far end of the hallway and starts after the old Jedi.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY

meta.s: Threepio looks around at the troops milling about the pirateship entry ramp.
Artoo, plugged into the computer socket, turns his dome left and right, beeping a response.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - CORRIDOR - BLAST SHIELDS DOOR

meta.s: Han and Chewbacca run down a long corridor with several troopers hot on their trail.
At the end of the hallway, blast doors begin to close in front of them.
The young starpilot and his furry companion race past the huge doors just as they are closing, and manage to get off a couple off laserblasts at the pursuing troops before the doors slam shut.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - HALLWAY LEADING TO MAIN FORWARD BAY

meta.s: Ben hurries along one of the tunnels leading to the hangar where the pirateship waits.
Just before he reaches the hangar, Darth Vader steps into view at the end of the tunnel, not ten feet away.
Vader lights his saber.
Ben also ignites his and steps slowly forward.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: I've been waiting for you, Obi-Wan.

meta.s: Ben Kenobi moves with elegant ease into a classical offensive position.
The fearsome Dark Knight takes a defensive stance.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: When I left you, I was but the learner; now I am the master.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: Only a master of evil, Darth.

meta.s: The two Galactic warriors stand perfectly still for a few moments, sizing each other up and waiting for the right moment.
Ben seems to be under increasing pressure and strain, as if an invisible weight were being placed upon him.
He shakes his head and, blinking, tries to clear his eyes.
Ben makes a sudden lunge at the huge warrior but is checked by a lightning movement of The Sith.
A masterful slash stroke by Vader is blocked by the old Jedi.
Another of the Jedi's blows is blocked, then countered.
Ben moves around the Dark Lord and starts backing into the massive starship hangar.
The two powerful warriors stand motionless for a few moments with laser swords locked in mid-air, creating a low buzzing sound.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: Your powers are weak, old man.

dialogue.name: BEN
dialogue.s: If you strike me down, I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

meta.s: Their lightsabers continue to meet in combat.

scene.sceneheader: INT. DEATH STAR - MAIN FORWARD BAY

meta.s: Han Solo and Chewbacca, their weapons in hand, lean back against the wall surveying the forward bay, watching the Imperial stormtroopers make their rounds of the hangar.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Didn't we just leave this party?

meta.s: Chewbacca growls a reply, as Luke and the princess join them.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: We ran into some old friends.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Seems okay, if we can get to it.
Just hope the old man got the tractor beam out of commission.

meta.s: Vader and Ben Kenobi continue their powerful duel.
As they hit their lightsabers together, lightning flashes on impact.
Troopers look on in interest as the old Jedi and Dark Lord of The Sith fight.
Suddenly Luke spots the battle from his group's vantage point.
Luke, Leia, Han, and Chewie look up and see Ben and Vader emerging from the hallways on the far side of the docking bay.
Threepio and Artoo-Detoo are in the center of the Death Star's Imperial docking bay.
Threepio ducks out of sight as the seven stormtroopers who were guarding the starship rush past them heading towards Ben and The Sith Knight.
He pulls on Artoo.
Solo, Chewie, Luke, and Leia tensely watch the duel.
The troops rush toward the battling knights.
They start for the Millennium Falcon.
Ben sees the troops charging toward him and realizes that he is trapped.
Vader takes advantage of Ben's momentary distraction and brings his mighty lightsaber down on the old man.
Ben manages to deflect the blow and swiftly turns around.
The old Jedi Knight looks over his shoulder at Luke, lifts his sword from Vader's then watches his opponent with a serene look on his face.
Vader brings his sword down, cutting old Ben in half.
Ben's cloak falls to the floor in two parts, but Ben is not in it.
Vader is puzzled at Ben's disappearance and pokes at the empty cloak.
As the guards are distracted, the adventurers and the robots reach the starship.
Luke sees Ben cut in two and starts for him.
Aghast, he yells out.
The stormtroopers turn toward Luke and begin firing at him.
The robots are already moving up the ramp into the Millennium Falcon, while Luke, transfixed by anger and awe, returns their fire.
Solo joins in the laserfire.
Vader looks up and advances toward them, as one of his troopers is struck down.
Luke fires his pistol at the door control panel, and it explodes.
The door begins to slide shut.
Three troopers charge forward firing laser bolts, as the door slides to a close behind them, shutting Vader and the other troops out of the docking bay.
A stormtrooper lies dead at the feet of his onrushing compatriots.
Luke starts for the advancing troops, as Solo and Leia move up the ramp into the pirateship.
He fires, hitting a stormtrooper, who crumbles to the floor.
Luke looks around to see where the voice came from.
He turns toward the pirateship, ducking Imperial gunfire from the troopers and races into the ship.
Han pulls back on the controls and the ship begins to move.
The dull thud of laser bolts bouncing off the outside of the ship as Chewie adjusts his controls.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I hope the old man got that tractor beam out if commission, or this is going to be a real short trip.

meta.s: Chewbacca growls in agreement.
The Millennium Falcon powers away from the Death Star docking bay, makes a spectacular turn and disappears into the vastness of space.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - CENTRAL HOLD AREA

meta.s: Luke, saddened by the loss of Obi-Wan Kenobi, stares off blankly as the robots look on.
Leia puts a blanket around him protectively, and Luke turns and looks up at her.
She sits down beside him.
Solo spots approaching enemy ships.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (to Chewie) We're coming up on the sentry ships.
Angle the deflector shields while I charge up the main guns!

scene.sceneheader: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - CENTRAL HOLD AREA

meta.s: Luke looks downward sadly, shaking his head back and forth, as the princess smiles comfortingly at him.
Artoo-Detoo beeps a reply.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: There wasn't anything you could have done.

meta.s: Han rushes into the hold area where Luke is sitting with the princess.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (to Luke) Come on, buddy, we're not out of this yet!

meta.s: Solo climbs into his attack position in the topside gunport.
Luke gets up and moves out toward the gunports as Leia heads for the cockpit.
Luke climbs down the ladder into the gunport cockpit, settling into one of the two main laser cannons mounted in large rotating turrets on either side of the ship.
Han adjusts his headset as he sits before the controls of his laser cannon, then speaks into the attached microphone.
Chewbacca and Princess Leia search the heavens for attacking TIE fighters.
The Wookiee pulls back on the speed controls as the ship bounces slightly.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - SOLO'S GUNPORT - COCKPIT

meta.s: Computer graphic readouts form on Solo's target screen, as Han reaches for controls.
Luke sits in readiness for the attack, his hand on the laser cannon's control button.
Chewbacca spots the enemy ships and barks.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT - POV (POINT OF VIEW) -

meta.s: The Imperial TIE fighters move towards the Millennium Falcon, one each veering off to the left and right of the pirateship.
The stars whip past behind the Imperial pilot as he adjusts his maneuvering joy stick.
The TIE fighter races past the Falcon, firing laser beams as it passes.
Threepio is seated in the hold area, next to Artoo-Detoo.
The pirateship bounces and vibrates as the power goes out in the room and then comes back on.
A TIE fighter maneuvers in front of Han, who follows it and fires at it with the laser cannon.
Luke does likewise, as the fighter streaks into view.
The ship has suffered a minor hit, and bounces slightly.
Two TIE fighters dive down toward the pirateship.
Luke fires at an unseen fighter.
Pan with pirateship as two TIE fighters charge through the background.
Laserbolts streak from all the craft.
The ship shudders as a laserbolt hits very close to the cockpit.
The Wookiee chatters something to Leia.
Full shot of a TIE fighter as it moves fast through the frame, firing on the pirate starship.
The two TIE fighters fire a barrage of laserbeams at the pirateship.
A laserbolt streaks into the side of the pirateship.
The ship lurches violently, throwing poor Threepio into a cabinet fill of small computer chips.
Leia watches the computer readout as Chewbacca manipulates the ship's controls.
An enemy laserbolt hits the pirateship's control panel, causing it to blow out in a shower of sparks.
Artoo-Detoo advances toward the smoking sparking control panel, dousing the inferno by spraying it with fire retardant beeping all the while.
Luke swivels in his gun mount, following the TIE fighter with his laser cannon.
Solo aims his laser cannon at the enemy fighter.
A TIE fighter streaks in front of the starship.
Leia watches the TIE fighter ship fly over.
A TIE fighter heads right for the pirateship, then zooms overhead.
Luke follows the TIE fighter across his field of view, firing laserbeams from his cannon.
A TIE fighter dives past the pirateship.
Luke fires at a TIE fighter.
At his port, Han follows a fighter in his sights, releasing a blast of laserfire.
He connects, and the fighter explodes into fiery dust.
Han laughs victoriously.
Two TIE fighters move toward and over the Millennium Falcon, unleashing a barrage of laserbolts at the ship.
Another TIE fighter moves in on the pirateship and Luke, smiling, fires the laser cannon at it, scoring a spectacular direct hit.
Han turns and gives Luke a victory wave which Luke gleefully returns.
Han turns back to his laser cannon.
Two more TIE fighters cross in front of the pirateship.
While Chewbacca manipulates the controls, Leia turns, looking over her shoulder out the ports.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: There are still two more of them out there!

meta.s: A TIE fighter moves up over the pirateship, firing laserblasts at it.
Luke and Han look into their respective projected target screens.
An Imperial fighter crosses Solo's port, and Han swivels in his chair, following it with blasts from his laser cannon.
Another fighter crosses Luke's port, and he reacts in a like manner, the glow of his target screen lighting his face.
The TIE fighter zooms toward the pirateship, firing destructive blasts at it.
Luke fires a laserblast at the approaching enemy fighter, and it bursts into a spectacular explosion.
Luke's projected screen gives a readout of the hit.
The pirateship bounces slightly as it is struck by the enemy fire.
The last of the attacking Imperial TIE fighters looms in, firing upon the Falcon.
Solo swivels behind his cannon, his aim describing the arc of the TIE fighter.
The fighter comes closer, firing at the pirateship, but a well-aimed blast from Solo's laser cannon hits the attacker, which blows up in a small atomic shower of burning fragments.
The princess jumps up and gives Chewie a congratulatory hug.
Threepio lies on the floor of the ship, completely tangled in the smoking, sparking wires.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: (to Artoo) This is all your fault.

meta.s: Artoo turns his dome from side to side, beeping in response.
The victorious Millennium Falcon moves off majestically through space.
Darth Vader strides into the control room, where Tarkin is watching the huge view screen.
A sea of stars is before him.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: They have just made the jump into hyperspace.

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: You're sure the homing beacon is secure aboard their ship?
I'm taking an awful risk, Vader.

meta.s: Han, removes his gloves and smiling, is at the controls of the ship.
Chewie moves into the aft section to check the damage.
Leia is seated near Han.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Not a bad bit of rescuing, huh?
You know, sometimes I even amaze myself.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: It's the only explanation for the ease of our escape.

meta.s: Frustrated, Leia shakes her head.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: At least the information in Artoo is still intact.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: The technical readouts of that battle station.
I only hope that when the data is analyzed, a weakness can be found.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Look, I ain't in this for your revolution, and I'm not in it for you, Princess.
I expect to be well paid.
I'm in it for the money!

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: You needn't worry about your reward.
If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive!

meta.s: She angrily turns, and as she starts out of the cockpit, passes Luke coming in.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: Your friend is quite a mercenary.
I wonder if he really cares about anything... or anyone.

meta.s: Luke, shaking his head, sits in the copilot seat.
He and Han stare out at the vast blackness of space.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: So... what do you think of her, Han?

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Still, she's got a lot of spirit.
I don't know, what do you think?
Do you think a princess and a guy like me...

meta.s: Luke says it with finality and looks away.
Han smiles at young Luke's jealousy.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND FOURTH MOON OF YAVIN

meta.s: The battered pirateship drifts into orbit around the planet Yavin and proceeds to one of its tiny green moons.
The pirateship soars over the dense jungle.
An alert guard, his laser gun in hand, scans the countryside.
He sets the gun down and looks toward the temple, barely visible in the foliage.
Rotting in a forest of gargantuan trees, an ancient temple lies shrouded in an eerie mist.
The air is heavy with the fantastic cries of unimaginable creatures.
Han, Luke and the others are greeted by the Rebel troops.
Luke and the group ride into the massive temple on an armored military speeder.
The military speeder stops in a huge spaceship hangar, set up in the interior of the crumbling temple.
Willard, the commander of the Rebel forces, rushes up to the group and gives Leia a big hug.
Every one is pleased to see her.
Willard composes himself, steps back and bows formally.

dialogue.name: WILLARD
dialogue.s: When we heard about Alderaan, we were afraid that you were... lost along with your father.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: We don't have time for our sorrows, Commander.
The battle station has surely tracked us here.
(looking pointedly to Han) It's the only explanation for the ease of our escape.
You must use the information in this R2 unit to plan the attack.

meta.s: The surface of the Death Star ominously approaches the red planet Yavin.
Grand Moff Tarkin and Lord Vader are interrupted in their discussion by the buzz of the comlink.
Tarkin moves to answer the call.

dialogue.name: DEATH STAR INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: We are approaching the planet Yavin.
The Rebel base is on a moon on the far side.
We are preparing to orbit the planet.

meta.s: A lone guard stands in a tower high above the Yavin landscape, surveying the countryside.
A mist hangs over the jungle of twisted green.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MASSASSI - WAR ROOM BRIEFING AREA

meta.s: Dodonna stands before a large electronic wall display.
Leia and several other senators are to one side of the giant readout.
The low-ceilinged room is filled with starpilots, navigators, and a sprinkling of R2-type robots.
Everyone is listening intently to what Dodonna is saying.
Han and Chewbacca are standing near the back.

dialogue.name: DODONNA
dialogue.s: The battle station is heavily shielded and carries a firepower greater than half the star fleet.
It's defenses are designed around a direct large- scale assault.
A small one-man fighter should be able to penetrate the outer defense.

meta.s: Gold Leader, a rough looking man in his early thirties, stands and addresses Dodonna.

dialogue.name: GOLD LEADER
dialogue.s: Pardon me for asking, sir, but what good are snub fighters going to be against that?

dialogue.name: DODONNA
dialogue.s: Well, the Empire doesn't consider a small one-man fighter to be any threat, or they'd have a tighter defense.
An analysis of the plans provided by Princess Leia has demonstrated a weakness in the battle station.

meta.s: Artoo-Detoo stands next to a similar robot, makes beeping sounds, and turns his head from right to left.

dialogue.name: DODONNA
dialogue.s: The approach will not be easy.
You are required to maneuver straight down this trench and skim the surface to this point.
The target area is only two meters wide.
It's a small thermal exhaust port, right below the main port.
The shaft leads directly to the reactor system.
A precise hit will start a chain reaction which should destroy the station.

meta.s: A murmer of disbelief runs through the room.

dialogue.name: DODONNA
dialogue.s: Only a precise hit will set up a chain reaction.
The shaft is ray- shielded, so you'll have to use proton torpedoes.

meta.s: Luke is sitting next to Wedge Antilles, a hotshot pilot about sixteen years old.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.s: That's impossible, even for a computer.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I used to bull's- eye womp rats in my T-sixteen back home.
They're not much bigger than two meters.

dialogue.name: DODONNA
dialogue.s: And may the Force be with you!

meta.s: The group rises and begins to leave.
The Death Star begins to move around the planet toward the tiny green moon.
Tarkin and Vader watch the computer projected screen with interest, as a circle of lights intertwines around one another on the screen showing it's position in relation to Yavin and the forth moon.

dialogue.name: DEATH STAR INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: Orbiting the planet at maximum velocity.
The moon with the Rebel base will be in range in thirty minutes.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: This will be a day long remembered.
It has seen the end of Kenobi and it will soon see the end of the Rebellion.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MASSASSI OUTPOST - MAIN HANGAR DECK

meta.s: Luke, Threepio and little Artoo enter the huge spaceship hangar and hurry along a long line of gleaming spacefighters.
Flight crews rush around loading last-minute armaments and unlocking power couplings.
In an area isolated from this activity Luke finds Han and Chewbacca loading small boxes onto an armored speeder.

dialogue.name: MAN'S VOICE
dialogue.s: (over loudspeaker) All flight trooper, man your stations.
All flight troops, man your stations.

meta.s: Han is deliberately ignoring the activity of the fighter pilots' preparation.
Luke is quite saddened at the sight of his friend's departure.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: So... you got your reward and you're just leaving then?

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: I got some old debts I've got to pay off with this stuff.
Even if I didn't, you don't think I'd be fool enough to stick around here, do you?
Why don't you come with us?
You're pretty good in a fight.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Why don't you take a look around?
You know what's about to happen, what they're up against.
They could use a good pilot like you.
You're turning your back on them.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: What good's a reward if you ain't around to use it?
Besides, attacking that battle station ain't my idea of courage.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Well, take care of yourself, Han.
I guess that's what you're best at, isn't it?

meta.s: Luke goes off and Han hesitates, then calls to him.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Hey, Luke... may the Force be with you!

meta.s: Luke turns and sees Han wink at him.
Luke lifts his hand in a small wave and then goes off.
Han turns to Chewie who growls at his captain,

scene.sceneheader: INT. MAIN HANGAR DECK - LUKE'S SHIP

meta.s: Luke, Leia, and Dodonna meet under a huge space fighter.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I don't know, I really thought he'd change his mind.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: He's got to follow his own path.
No one can choose it for him.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I only wish Ben were here.

meta.s: Leia gives Luke a little kiss, turns, and goes off.
As Luke heads for his ship, another pilot rushes up to him and grabs his arm.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.s: How'd you get here... are you going out with us?

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Of course, I'll be up there with you!
Listen, have I got some stories to tell...

meta.s: Red Leader, a rugged handsome man in his forties, comes up behind Luke and Biggs.
He has the confident smile of a born leader.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: Have you been checked out on the Incom T-sixty- five?

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.s: Sir, Luke is the best bushpilot in the outer rim territories.

meta.s: Red Leader pats Luke on the back as they stop in front of his fighter.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: I met your father once when I was just a boy, he was a great pilot.
If you've got half of your father's skill, you'll do better than all right.

meta.s: Red Leader hurries to his own ship.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.s: Listen, you'll tell me your stories when we come back.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I told you I'd make it someday, Biggs.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.s: It's going to be like old times, Luke.
We're a couple of shooting stars that'll never be stopped!

meta.s: Luke laughs and shakes his head in agreement.
He heads for his ship.

As Luke begins to climb up the ladder into his sleek, deadly spaceship, the crew chief, who is working on the craft, points to little Artoo, who is being hoisted into a socket on the back of the fighter.

dialogue.name: CHIEF
dialogue.s: This R2 unit of your seems a bit beat up.
Do you want a new one?

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: That little droid and I have been through a lot together.

meta.s: The crewmen lower Artoo-Detoo into the craft.
Now a part of the exterior shell of the starship, the little droid beeps that he is fine.
Luke climbs up into the cockpit of his fighter and puts an his helmet.
Threepio looks on from the floor of the massive hangar as the crewmen secure his little electronic partner into Luke's X-wing.
It's an emotional-filled moment as Artoo beeps good-bye.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: Hang on tight,Artoo, you've got to come back.

meta.s: Artoo beeps in agreement.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: You wouldn't want my life to get boring, would you?

meta.s: Artoo whistles his reply.
All final preparations are made for the approaching battle.
The hangar is buzzing with the last minute activity as the pilots and crewmen alike make their final adjustments.
The hum of activity is occasionally trespassed by the distorted voice of the loudspeaker issuing commands.
Coupling hoses are disconnected from the ships as they are fueled.
Cockpit shields roll smoothly into place over each pilot.
A signalman, holding red guiding lights, directs the ships.
Luke, a trace of a smile gracing his lips, peers about through his goggles.

dialogue.name: BEN'S VOICE
dialogue.s: Luke, the Force will be with you.

meta.s: Luke is confused at the voice and taps his headphones.
All that can be seen of the fortress is a lone guard standing on a small pedestal jutting out above the dense jungle.

The muted gruesome crying sounds that naturally permeate this eerie purgatory are overwhelmed by the thundering din of ion rockets as four silver starships catapult from the foliage in a tight formation and disappears into the morning cloud cover.
The princess, Threepio, and a field commander sit quietly before the giant display showing the planet Yavin and its four moons.
The red dot that represents the Death Star moves ever closer to the system.
A series of green dots appear around the fourth moon.
A din of indistinct chatter fills the war room.

dialogue.name: MASSASSI INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: Estimated time to firing range, fifteen minutes.

meta.s: The Death Star slowly moves behind the massive yellow surface of Yavin in the foreground, as many X-wing fighters flying in formation zoom toward us and out of the frame.
Light from a distant sun creates an eerie atmospheric glow around a huge planet, Yavin.
Rebel fighters flying in formation settle ominously in the foreground and very slowly pull away.
Red Leader lowers his visor and adjusts his gun sights, looking to each side at his wing men.
One of the Rebel fighters checks in through his mike.
Biggs checks his fighter's controls, alert and ready for combat.

dialogue.name: RED SEVEN
dialogue.s: (over Biggs' headset) Red Seven standing by.

meta.s: Artoo-Detoo, in position outside of the fighter, turns his head from side to side and makes beeping sounds.
The group of X-wing fighters move in formation toward the Death Star, unfolding the wings and locking them in the "X" position.

dialogue.name: READ LEADER
dialogue.s: (over headset) We're passing through their magnetic field.

meta.s: Luke adjusts his controls as he concentrates on the approaching Death Star.
The ship begins to be buffeted slightly.
The fighters, now X-shaped darts, move in formation.
The Death Star now appears to be a small moon growing rapidly in size as the Rebel fighters approach.
Complex patterns on the metallic surface begin to become visible.
A large dish antenna is built into the surface on one side.
Wedge is amazed and slightly frightened at the awesome spectacle.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.s: Look at the size of that thing!

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: (over headset) Cut the chatter, Red Two.

meta.s: As the fighters move closer to the Death Star, the awesome size of the gargantuan Imperial fortress is revealed.

Half of the deadly space station is in shadow and this area sparkles with thousands of small lights running in thin lines and occasionally grouped in large clusters; somewhat like a city at night as seen from a weather satellite.

dialogue.name: GOLD LEADER
dialogue.s: Red Leader, this is Gold Leader.

dialogue.name: GOLD LEADER
dialogue.s: We're starting for the target shaft now.

meta.s: Red Leader looks around at his wingmen; the Death Star looming in from behind.
Two Y-wing fighters bob back and forth in the background.
He moves his computer targeting device into position.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: I'm going to cut across the axis and try and draw their fire.

meta.s: Two squads of Rebel fighters peel off.
The X-wings dive towards the Death Star surface.
A thousand lights glow across the dark grey expanse of the huge station.
Alarm sirens scream as soldiers scramble to large turbo- powered laser gun emplacements.
Electronic drivers rotate the huge guns into position as crew adjust their targeting devices.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Laserbolts streak through the star-filled night.
The Rebel X- wing fighters move in toward the Imperial base, as the Death Star aims its massive laser guns at the Rebel forces and fires.
Princess Leia listens to the battle over the intercom.
Threepio is at her side.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.s: (over war room speaker system) Heavy fire, boss!

meta.s: An X-wing zooms across the surface of the Death Star.
Technical crews scurry here and there loading last-minute armaments and unlocking power cables.
Wedge maneuvers his fighter toward the menacing Death Star.
X-wings continue in their attack course on the Death Star.
Luke nosedives radically, starting his attack on the monstrous fortress.
The Death Star surface streaks past the cockpit window.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: This is Red Five; I'm going in!

meta.s: Luke's X-wing races toward the Death Star.
Laserbolts streak from Luke's weapons, creating a huge fireball explosion on the dim surface.
Terror crosses Luke's face as he realizes he won't be able to pull out in time to avoid the fireball.
Luke's ship emerges from the fireball, with the leading edges of his wings slightly scorched.
Luke adjusts his controls and breathes a sigh of relief.
Flak bursts outside the cockpit window.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I got a little cooked, but I'm okay.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Rebel fighters continue to strafe the Death Star's surface with laserbolts.
Walls buckle and cave in.
Troops and equipment are blown in all directions.
Stormtroopers stagger out of the rubble.
Standing in the middle of the chaos, a vision of calm and foreboding, is Darth Vader.
One of his Astro-Officers rushes up to him.

dialogue.name: ASTRO-OFFICER
dialogue.s: We count thirty Rebel ships, Lord Vader.
But they're so small they're evading our turbo-lasers!

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: We'll have to destroy them ship to ship.
Get the crews to their fighters.

meta.s: Smoke belches from the giant laser guns as they wind up their turbine generators to create sufficient power.
The crew rushes about preparing for another blast.
Even the troopers head gear is not adequate to protect them from the overwhelming noise of the monstrous weapon.
One troopers bangs his helmet with his hand in an attempt to stop the ringing.

scene.sceneheader: INT. READ LEADER'S X-WING FIGHTER - COCKPIT - TRAVELING

meta.s: Red Leader flies through a heavy hail of flak.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: Luke, let me know when you're going in.

meta.s: The Red Leader's X-wing flies past Luke as he puts his nose down and starts his attack dive.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: I'm on my way in now...

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: There's a lot of fire coming from the right side of that deflection tower.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Luke flings his X-wing into a twisting dive across the horizon and down onto the dim grey surface.
A shot hurls from Luke's guns.
Laserbolts streak toward the onrushing Death Star surface.
Several small radar emplacements erupt in flame.
Laserfire erupts from a protruding tower on the surface.
The blurry Death Star surface races past the cockpit window as a big smile sweeps across Luke's face at the success of his run.
Flak thunders on all sides of him.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The Death Star superstructure races past Luke as he maneuvers his craft through a wall of laserfire and peels away from the surface towards the heavens.
The thunder and smoke of the big guns reverberate throughout the massive structure.
Many soldiers rush about in the smoke and chaos, silhouetted by the almost continual flash of explosions.
Biggs dives through a forest of radar domes, antennae, and gun towers as he shoots low across the Death Star surface.
A dense barrage of laserfire streaks by on all sides.
Imperial star pilots dash in unison to a line of small auxiliary hatches that lead to Imperial TIE fighters.
Princess Leia, surrounded by her generals and aides, paces nervously before a lighted computer table.
On all sides technicians work in front of many lighted glass walls.
Dodonna watches quietly from one corner.
One of the officers working over a screen speaks into his headset.

dialogue.name: CONTROL OFFICER
dialogue.s: Squad leaders, we've picked up a new group of signals.

meta.s: Luke looks around to see if he can spot the approaching Imperial fighters.

scene.sceneheader: INT. RED LEADER'S X-WING - COCKPIT - TRAVELING

meta.s: The Death Star's surface sweeps past as Red Leader searches the sky for the Imperial fighters.
Flak pounds at his ship.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: With all this jamming, they'll be on top of you before your scope can pick them up.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Silhouetted against the rim lights of the Death Star horizon, four ferocious Imperial TIE ships dive on the Rebel fighters.
Two of the TIE fighters peel off and drop out of frame.
Pan with the remaining two TIE ships.
Biggs panics when he discovers a TIE ship on his tail.
The horizon in the background twists around as he peels off, hoping to lose the Imperial fighter.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: You've picked one up... watch it!

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Biggs zooms off the surface and into space, closely followed by an Imperial TIE fighter.
The TIE ship fires several laserbolts at Biggs, but misses.
Biggs see the TIE ship behind him and swings around, trying to avoid him.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.s: He's on me tight, I can't shake him...

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Biggs, flying at high altitude, peels off and dives toward the Death Star surface, but he is unable to lose the TIE fighter, who sticks close to his tail.
Luke is flying upside down.
He rotates his ship around to normal attitude as he comes out of his dive.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Hang on, Biggs, I'm coming in.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Biggs and the tailing TIE ship dive for the surface, now followed by a fast-gaining Luke.
After Biggs dives out of sight, Luke chases the Imperial fighter.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: In the foreground, the Imperial fighter races across the Death Star's surface, closely followed by Luke in the background.

scene.sceneheader: INT. LUKE'S X-WING FIGHTER - COCKPIT - TRAVELING

meta.s: There is a shot from Luke's X-wing of the TIE ship exploding in a mass of flames.
Darth Vader strides purposefully down a Death Star corridor, flanked by Imperial stormtroopers.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: Several fighters have broken off from the main group.

meta.s: A concerned Princess Leia, Threepio, Dodonna, and other officers of the Rebellion stand around the huge round readout screen, listening to the ship-to-ship communication on the room's loudspeaker.
Luke's ship soars away from the Death Star's surface as he spots the tailing TIE fighter.
The TIE pilot takes aim at Luke's X-wing.
The Imperial TIE fighter pilot scores a hit on Luke's ship.
Fire breaks out on the right side of the X-wing.
Luke looks out of his cockpit at the flames on his ship.
Smoke pours out from behind Artoo-Detoo.

dialogue.name: LUKE'S VOICE
dialogue.s: Artoo, see what you can do with it.

meta.s: Green laserfire moves past the beeping little robot as his head turns.
Luke nervously works his controls.
In the war room, Leia stands frozen as she listens and worries about Luke.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: (over speaker) Can you see Red Five?

dialogue.name: RED TEN
dialogue.s: (over speaker) There's a heavy fire zone on this side.

meta.s: Luke spots the TIE fighter behind him and soars away from the Death Star surface.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Luke's ship soars closer to the surface of the Death Star, an Imperial TIE fighter closing in on him in hot pursuit.
The Death Star whips below Wedge.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Wedge dives across the horizon toward Luke and the TIE fighter.
Wedge moves his X-wing in rapidly.
Luke reacts frantically.
The fighter pilot watches Wedge's X-wing approach.
Another X- wing joins him, and both unleash a volley of laserfire on the Imperial fighter.
The TIE fighter explodes, filling the screen with white light.
Luke's ship can be seen far in the distance.
Luke looks about in relief.
Leia, Threepio, Dodonna and other Rebel officers are listening to the Rebel Fighter's radio transmissions over the war room intercom.
Gold Leader peels off and starts toward the long trenches at the Death Star surface pole.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Three Y-wing fighters of the Gold group dive out of the stars toward the Death Star surface.
Leia and the others are grouped around the screen, as technicians move about attending to their duties.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Three Imperial TIE ships in precise formation dive toward the Death Star surface.
Darth Vader calmly adjusts his control stick as the stars whip past in the window above his head.
Technicians are seated at the computer readout table.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Gold Leader approaches the surface and pulls out to skim the surface of the huge station.
The ship moves into a deep trench, firing laserbolts.
The surface streaks past as laserfire is returned by the Death Star.

scene.sceneheader: INT. GOLD FIVE'S Y-WING - COCKPIT - TRAVELING

meta.s: Gold Five is a pilot in his early fifties with a very battered helmet that looks like it's been through many battles.
He looks around to see if enemy ships are near.
His fighter is buffeted by Imperial flak.
Gold Leader races down the enormous trench that leads to the exhaust port.
Laserbolts blast toward him in increasing numbers, occasionally exploding near the ship causing it to bounce about.

dialogue.name: GOLD LEADER
dialogue.s: Switch power to front deflector screens.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Three Y-wing skim the Death Star surface deep in the trench, as laserbolts streak past on all sides.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. DEATH STAR SURFACE - GUN EMPLACEMENTS

meta.s: An exterior surface gun blazes away at the oncoming Rebel fighters.

dialogue.name: GOLD LEADER
dialogue.s: How many guns do you think, Gold Five.

dialogue.name: GOLD FIVE
dialogue.s: (over speaker) I'd say about twenty guns.
Some on the surface, some on the towers.

meta.s: Leia, Threepio, and the technicians view the projected target screen, as red and blue target lights glow.
The red target near the center blinks on and off.

dialogue.name: MASSASSI INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: (over speaker) Death Star will be in range in five minutes.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The three Y-wing fighters race toward camera and zoom overhead through a hail of laserfire.
Gold Leader pulls his computer targeting device down in front of his eye.
Laserbolts continue to batter the Rebel craft.
Gold Two, a younger pilot about Luke's age, pulls down his targeting eye viewer and adjusts it.
His ship shudders under intense laser barrage.
As the fighters begin to approach the target area, suddenly all the laserfire stops.
An eerie clam clings over the trench as the surface whips past in a blur.
Gold Five looks behind him.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Three Imperial TIE ships, Darth Vader in the center flanked by two wingmen, dive in precise formation almost vertically toward the Death Star surface.
