Darth Vader calmly adjusts his control stick as the stars zoom by.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Three TIE fighters zoom across the surface of the Death Star.
Vader lines up Gold Two in his targeting computer.
Vader's hands grip the control stick as he presses the button.
The cockpit explodes around Gold Two.
His head falls forward.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: As Gold Two's ship explodes, debris is flung out into space.
Gold Leader looks over his shoulder at the scene.
The three TIE fighters race along in the trench in a tight formation.
Gold Leader panics.
Gold Five, the old veteran, trys to calm Gold Leader.
The Death Star races by outside the cockpit window as he adjusts his targeting device.
The older pilot remains calm.
Now he's really panicked.
Vader calmly adjusts his targeting computer and pushes the fire button.
Gold Leader's ship is hit by Vader's laser.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Gold Leader explodes in a ball of flames, throwing debris in all directions.
Gold Five moves in on the exhaust port.
Luke looks over his shoulder at the action outside of his cockpit.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: One of the engines explodes on Gold Five's Y-wing fighter, blazing out of control.
He dives past the horizon toward the Death Star's surface, passing a TIE fighter during his descent.
Gold Five, a veteran of countless campaigns, spins toward his death.
Luke looks nervously about him at the explosive battle.
Grant Moff Tarkin and a Chief Officer stand in the Death Star's control room.

dialogue.name: OFFICER
dialogue.s: We've analyzed their attack, sir, and there is a danger.
Should I have your ship standing by?

dialogue.name: TARKIN
dialogue.s: I think you overestimate their chances!

meta.s: Tarkin turns to the computer readout screen.
Flames move around the green disk at the center of the screen, as numbers read across the bottom.

dialogue.name: VOICE
dialogue.s: (over speaker) Rebel base, three minutes and closing.

meta.s: Red Leader looks over at his wingmen.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: Red Group, this is Red Leader.

meta.s: Dodonna moves to the intercom as he fiddles with the computer keys.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: (over speaker) Rendezvous at mark six point one.

dialogue.name: DODONNA
dialogue.s: (over headset) Red Leader, this is Base One.
Keep half your group out of range for the next run.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER'S VOICE
dialogue.s: Luke, take Red Two and Three.
Hold up here and wait for my signal... to start your run.

meta.s: Luke nods his head.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The X-wing fighters of Luke, Biggs, and Wedge fly in formation high above the Death Star's surface.
Luke peers out from his cockpit.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Two X-wings move across the surface of the Death Star.
Red Leader's X-wing drops down to the surface leading to the exhaust port.
Red Leader looks around to watch for the TIE fighters.
He begins to perspire.
Red Leader roams down the trench of the Death Star as lasers streak across the black heavens.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. DEATH STAR SURFACE - GUN EMPLACEMENTS

meta.s: A huge remote-control laser cannon fires at the approaching Rebel fighters.
The Rebel fighters evade the Imperial laser blasts.
Red Ten looks around for the Imperial fighters.

dialogue.name: RED TEN
dialogue.s: We should be able to see it by now.

meta.s: From the cockpits of the Rebel pilots, the surface of the Death Star streaks by, with Imperial laserfire shooting toward them.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: Keep your eyes open for those fighters!

meta.s: Three X-wing fighters move in formation down the Death Star trench.

dialogue.name: RED TEN'S VOICE
dialogue.s: Red Five, can you see them from where you are?

meta.s: Luke looks down at the Death Star surface below.
Red Ten looks up and sees the Imperial fighters.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: (over headset) Coming in point three five.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Three TIE fighters, Vader flanked by two wingmen, dive in a tight formation.
The sun reflects off their dominate solar fins as they loop toward the Death Star's surface.
Red Leader pulls his targeting device in front of his eyes and makes several adjustments.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Red Leader's X-wing moves up the Death Star trench.
Red Leader looks at his computer target readout screen.
He then looks into his targeting device.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: Just hold them off for a few seconds.

meta.s: Vader adjusts his control lever and dives on the X-wing fighters.
The three TIE fighters move in formation across the Death Star surface.
Red Leader lines up his target on the targeting device cross hairs.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Vader and his wingmen zoom down the trench.
Vader rapidly approaches the two X-wings of Red Ten and Red Twelve.
Vader's laser cannon flashes below the view of the front porthole.
the X-wings show in the center of Vader's computer screen.
Red Twelve's X-wing fighter is hit by Vader's laserfire, and it explodes into flames against the trench.
Red Ten works at his controls furiously, trying to avoid Vader's fighter behind him.
RED TEN: You'd better let her loose.
Red Leader is concentrating on his targeting device.
Red Ten panics.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Vader and his wingmen whip through the trench in pursuit of the Rebel fighters.
Vader cooly pushes the fire button on his control stick.
Darth Vader's well-aimed laserfire proves to be unavoidable, and strikes Red Ten's ship.
Red Ten screams in anguish and pain.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Red Ten's ship explodes and bursts into flames.
Grimly, Red Leader takes careful aim and watches his computer targeting device, which shows the target lined up in the cross hairs, and fires.
An armed Imperial stormtrooper is knocked to the floor from the attack explosion.
Other troopers scurrying about the corridors are knocked against the wall and lose their balance.
Leia and the others stare at the computer screen.
Red Leader looks back at the receding Death Star.
Tiny explosions are visible in the distance.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: It just impacted on the surface.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR - TIE FIGHTER

meta.s: Darth Vader peels off in pursuit as Red Leader's X-wing passes the Death Star horizon.
Vader swings his ship around for the next kill.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: (over headset) Red Leader, we're right above you.

meta.s: Luke tries to spot Red Leader.
He looks down at the Death Star surface.
A wary Red Leader looks about nervously.
Luke looks excitedly toward Red Leader's X-wing.

dialogue.name: RED LEADER
dialogue.s: (over headset) Get set to make your attack run.

meta.s: Vader's gloved hands make contact with the control sticks, and he presses their firing buttons.
Red Leader fights to gain control of his ship.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Laserbolts are flung from Vader's TIE fighter, connecting with Red Leader's Rebel X-wing fighter.
Red Leader buys it, creating a tremendous explosion far below.
He screams and is destroyed.
Luke looks out the window of his X-wing at the explosion far below.
For the first time, he feels the helplessness of his situation.
Grand Moff Tarkin casts a sinister eye at the computer screen.

dialogue.name: DEATH STAR INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: Rebel base, one minute and closing.

meta.s: Dodonna and Princess Leia, with Threepio beside them, listen intently to the talk between the pilots.
The room is grim after Red Leader's death.
Princess Leia nervously paces the room.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: (over speaker) Biggs, Wedge, let's close it up.

meta.s: The horizon twists as Wedge begins to pull out.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The two X-wings peel off against a background of stars and dive toward the Death Star.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.s: Luke, at that speed will you be able to pull out in time?

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: It'll be just like Beggar's Canyon back home.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The three X-wings move in, unleashing a barrage of laserfire.
Laserbolts are returned from the Death Star.
Luke's lifelong friend struggles with his controls.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.s: We'll stay back far enough to cover you.

meta.s: Flak and laserbolts flash outside Luke's cockpit window.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.s: (over headset) My scope shows the tower, but I can't see the exhaust port!
Are you sure the computer can hit it?

meta.s: The Death Star laser cannon slowly rotates as it shoots laserbolts.
Luke looks around for the Imperial TIE fighters.
He thinks for a moment and then moves his targeting device into position.
Wedge looks excitedly about for any sign of the TIE fighters.
Luke's X-wing streaks through the trench, firing lasers.
Luke breaks into a nervous sweat as the laserfire is returned, knicking one of his wings close to the engine.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: (to Artoo) Artoo... that, that stabilizer's broken loose again!
See if you can't lock it down!

meta.s: Artoo works to repair the damages.
The canyon wall rushes by in the background, making his delicate task seem even more precarious.
Two laser cannons are firing on the Rebel fighters.
Wedge looks up and sees the TIE ships.
Luke's targeting device marks off the distance to the target.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Vader and his wingmen zoom closer.
Vader adjusts his controls and fires laserbolts at two X- wings flying down the trench.
He scores a direct hit on Wedge.
Leia and the others are grouped around the computer board.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: You can't do any more good back there!

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Wedge pulls his crippled X-wing back away from the battle.
Vader watches the escape but issues a command to his wingmen.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Luke's X-wing speeds down the trench; the three TIE fighters, still in perfect unbroken formation, tail close behind.
Biggs looks around at the TIE fighters.
He is worried.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.s: Hurry, Luke, they're coming in much faster this time.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The three TIE fighters move ever closer, closing in on Luke and Biggs.
Luke looks back anxiously at little Artoo.

dialogue.name: LUKE
dialogue.s: Artoo, try and increase the power!

meta.s: Ignoring the bumpy ride, flak, and lasers, a beeping Artoo- Detoo struggles to increase the power, his dome turning from side to side.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Stealthily, the TIE formation creeps closer.
Vader adjusts his control stick.
Biggs looks around at the TIE fighters.
Luke looks into his targeting device.
He moves it away for a moment and ponders its use.
He looks back into the computer targeter.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Vader and his wingmen race through the Death Star trench.
Biggs moves in to cover for Luke, but Vader gains on him.
Biggs sees the TIE fighter aiming at him.
Vader squeezes the fire button on his controls.
Biggs' cockpit explodes around him, lighting him in red.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Biggs' ship bursts into a million flaming bits and scatters across the surface.
Leia and the others stare at the computer board.
Luke is stunned by Biggs' death.
His eyes are watering, but his anger is also growing.
Grand Moff Tarkin watches the projected target screen with satisfaction.

dialogue.name: DEATH STAR INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: Rebel base, thirty seconds and closing.

meta.s: Vader takes aim on Luke and talks to the wingmen.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR - LUKE'S SHIP

meta.s: Luke's ship streaks through the trench of the Death Star.
Princess Leia returns her general's worried and doubtful glances with solid, grim determination.
Threepio seems nervous.
Luke concentrates on his targeting device.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Three TIE fighters charge away down the trench toward Luke.
Vader's finger's curls around the control stick.
Luke adjusts the lens of his targeting device.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Luke's ship charges down the trench.
Luke lines up the yellow cross-hair lines of the targeting device's screen.
He looks into the targeting device, then starts at a voice he hears.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The Death Star trench zooms by.
Luke looks up, then starts to look back into the targeting device.
He has second thoughts.
A grim determination sweeps across Luke's face as he closes his eyes and starts to mumble Ben's training to himself.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Luke's fighter streaks through the trench.

dialogue.name: VADER
dialogue.s: The Force is strong with this one!

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Vader follows Luke's X-wing down the trench.
Luke looks to the targeting device, then away as he hears Ben's voice.
Luke's hand reaches for the control panel and presses the button.
The targeting device moves away.
Leia and the others stand watching the projected screen.

dialogue.name: BASE VOICE
dialogue.s: Luke, you switched off your targeting computer.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Luke's ship streaks ever close to the exhaust port.
Luke looks at the Death Star surface streaking by.
Artoo-Detoo turns his head from side to side, beeping in anticipation.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The three TIE fighters, manned by Vader and his two wingmen, follow Luke's X-wing down the trench.
Vader maneuvers his controls as he looks at his doomed target.
He presses the fire buttons on his control sticks.
Laserfire shoots toward Luke's X-wing fighter.
A large burst of Vader's laserfire engulfs Artoo.
The arms go limp on the smoking little droid as he makes a high-pitched sound.
Luke looks frantically back over his shoulder at Artoo.
Smoke billows out around little Artoo and sparks begin to fly.
Artoo's beeping sounds die out.
Leia and the others stare intently at the projected screen, while Threepio watches the Princess.
Lights representing the Death Star and targets glow brightly.

dialogue.name: MASSASSI INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: The Death Star has cleared the planet.
The Death Star has cleared the planet.

meta.s: Tarkin glares at the projected target screen.
An officer reaches up and pushes buttons on the control panel, as green lighted buttons turn to red.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The three TIE fighters zoom down the Death Star trench in pursuit of Luke, never breaking formation.
Luke looks anxiously at the exhaust port.
Vader adjusts his control sticks, checking his projected targeting screen.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Luke's ship barrels down the trench.
Vader's targeting computer swings around into position.
Vader takes careful aim on Luke's X-wing fighter.
He pushes the fire buttons.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The three TIE fighters move in on Luke.
As Vader's center fighter unleashes a volley of laserfire, one of the TIE ships at his side is hit and explodes into flame.
The two remaining ships continue to move in.
Luke looks about, wondering whose laserfire destroyed Vader's wingman.
Vader is taken by surprise, and looks out from his cockpit.
Vader's wingman searches around him trying to locate the unknown attacker.
Han and Chewbacca grin from ear to ear.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The Millennium Falcon heads right at the two TIE fighters.
It's a collision course.
The wingman spots the pirateship coming at him and warns the Dark Lord.
Vader's wingman panics at the sight of the oncoming pirate starship and veers radically to one side, colliding with Vader's TIE fighter in the process.
Vader's wingman crashes into the side wall of the trench and explodes.
Vader's damaged ship spins out of the trench with a damaged wing.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Vader's ship spins out of control with a bent solar fin, heading for deep space.
Vader turns round and round in circles as his ship spins into space.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Solo's ship moves in toward the Death Star trench.
Solo, smiling, speaks to Luke over his headset mike.
Leia and the others listen to Solo's transmission.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: (over speaker) Now let's blow this thing and go home!

meta.s: Luke looks up and smiles.
He concentrates on the exhaust port, then fires his laser torpedoes.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SURFACE OF THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Luke's torpedoes shoot toward the port and seems to simply disappear into the surface and not explode.
But the shots do find their mark and have gone into the exhaust port and are heading for the main reactor.
Luke throws his head back in relief.
An Imperial soldier runs to the control panel board and pulls the attack lever as the board behind him lights up.

dialogue.name: INTERCOM VOICE
dialogue.s: Stand by to fire at Rebel base.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: Two X-wings, a Y-wing, and the pirateship race toward Yavin in the distance.
Several Imperial soldiers, flanking a pensive Grand Moff Tarkin, busily push control levers and buttons.
The rumble of a distant explosion begins.

scene.sceneheader: EXT. SPACE AROUND THE DEATH STAR

meta.s: The Rebel ships race out of sight, leaving the moon-like Death Star alone against a blanket of stars.
Several small flashes appear on the surface.
The Death Star bursts into a supernova, creating a spectacular heavenly display.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: That was one in a million.

meta.s: Luke is at ease, and his eyes are closed.

dialogue.name: BEN'S VOICE
dialogue.s: Remember, the Force will be with you... always.

meta.s: The ship rocks back and forth.
Vader's ship spins off into space.
The Rebel ships race toward the fourth moon of Yavin.
Luke climbs out of his starship fighter and is cheered by a throng of ground crew and pilots.
Luke climbs down the ladder as they all welcome him with laughter, cheers, and shouting.
Princess Leia rushes toward him.
She throws her arms around Luke and hugs him as they dance around in a circle.
Solo runs in toward Luke and they embrace one another, slapping each other on the back.

dialogue.name: HAN
dialogue.s: Well, I wasn't gonna let you get all the credit and take all the reward.

meta.s: Luke and Han look at one another, as Solo playfully shoves at Luke's face.
Leia moves in between them.

dialogue.name: LEIA
dialogue.s: (laughing) Hey, I knew there was more to you than money.

meta.s: Luke looks toward the ship.
The fried little Artoo-Detoo is lifted off the back of the fighter and carried off under the worried eyes of Threepio.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: (to mechanic) You can repair him, can't you?

dialogue.name: TECHNICIAN
dialogue.s: We'll get to work on him right away.

dialogue.name: THREEPIO
dialogue.s: Sir, if any of my circuits or gears will help, I'll gladly donate them.

scene.sceneheader: INT. MASSASSI OUTPOST - MAIN THRONE ROOM

meta.s: Luke, Han, and Chewbacca enter the huge ruins of the main temple.
Hundreds of troops are lined up in neat rows.
Banners are flying and at the far end stands a vision in white, the beautiful young Senator Leia.
Luke and the others solemnly march up the long aisle and kneel before Senator Leia.
From one side of the temple marches a shined-up and fully repaired Artoo-Detoo.
He waddles up to the group and stands next to an equally pristine Threepio, who is rather awestruck by the whole event.
Chewbacca is confused.
Dodonna and several other dignitaries sit on the left of the Princess Leia.
Leia is dressed in a long white dress and is staggeringly beautiful.
She rises and places a gold medallion around Han's neck.
He winks at her.
She then repeats the ceremony with Luke, who is moved by the event.
They turn and face the assembled troops, who all bow before them.
Chewbacca growls and Artoo beeps with happiness.
END CREDITS OVER STARS
THE END
